T02TD2586E:151a-1: ne dod dagha ta bi dhi:/
T02TD2586E:151a-3: spyan dbye ba'i cho ga / ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2586E:151a-4: ma 'ongs rnams la phan slad du //
T02TD2586E:151a-5: zab cing rgya che'i mtshan bstan pa'i //
T02TD2586E:151a-6: sku gzugs la sogs rab gnas pa //
T02TD2586E:151a-7: rung bar bya phyir bdag gis bshad //
T02TD2586E:151a-9: phyag rgya sngags dang 'dug stangs dang //
T02TD2586E:151a-10: bzlas brjod sbyin sreg mchod pa dang //
T02TD2586E:151a-11: las la sbyar dang slar bsdu rnams //
T02TD2586E:151a-12: slob dpon de nyid bcu shes pas //
T02TD2586E:151a-13: cho ga rnams ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2586E:151a-14: lha khang mchod rten lugs ma dang //
T02TD2586E:151a-15: dam chos glegs bam ras ris rnams //
T02TD2586E:151a-16: zin cing thams cad rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2586E:151a-17: bde ba'i yon tan kun bskyed cing //
T02TD2586E:151a-18: bsod nams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2586E:151a-19: rab tu gnas par byed par 'os //
T02TD2586E:151a-20: sku gzugs la sogs zin nas ni //
T02TD2586E:151a-21: yun rings gnas kyang ma mchod na //
T02TD2586E:151a-22: ji srid mchod gnas ma gyur pas //
T02TD2586E:151a-23: de la mi shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2586E:151a-24: de la bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2586E:151a-25: gzhung bzhin bya ba rdzogs bya ste //
T02TD2586E:151a-26: rab tu gnas ba'i rgyud dag la //
T02TD2586E:151a-27: 'bras chan la sogs kyis sbyang bya //
T02TD2586E:151a-28: chu bdun gyis ni bkru byas shing //
T02TD2586E:151a-29: rnam lnga 'dag chal gyis kyang bkru //
T02TD2586E:151a-30: d'urwas kyang ni brud par bya //
T02TD2586E:151a-31: de nas gang yin lhar bskyed de //
T02TD2586E:151a-32: spyan drangs bstims la mchod pa bya //
T02TD2586E:151a-33: bcug ste dbang rnams bskur ba ni //
T02TD2586E:151a-34: rig pa'i dbang ni bskur bya ste //
T02TD2586E:151a-35: 'khor ba ma stongs bar dag tu //
T02TD2586E:151a-36: sems can don mdzod ces pa brjod //
T02TD2586E:151a-37: na bza' dri zhim rgyan rnams dbul //
T02TD2586E:151a-38: mchod pa'i bye brag rnams kyis mchod //
T02TD2586E:151a-39: thur ma phyag rgyas sbyan [?] yang dbye //
T02TD2586E:151a-40: snyan 'bru zhal dbye dbu bshad cing //
T02TD2586E:151a-41: phyag zhabs sen mo dreg cing sku phyi'o //
T02TD2586E:151a-42: me long dbul zhing mchod pa kun gyis mchod //
T02TD2586E:151a-43: de nas bzhugs su gsol pa ni //
T02TD2586E:151b-0: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang @151b lha rnams dang //
T02TD2586E:151b-1: de sras tshangs la sogs pa kun //
T02TD2586E:151b-2: gang zhig cho ga'i bya ba ni //
T02TD2586E:151b-3: nongs gyur de dag bzod mdzad rigs //
T02TD2586E:151b-4: sbyin bdag rnams la zhi ba dang //
T02TD2586E:151b-5: bde legs chen po kun mdzad de //
T02TD2586E:151b-6: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2586E:151b-7: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2586E:151b-9: bskal pa brgya las lhag gnas shing //
T02TD2586E:151b-10: sa dang chu dang me dang ni //
T02TD2586E:151b-11: rlung las lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs //
T02TD2586E:151b-12: slob dpon slob mar bcas pa dang //
T02TD2586E:151b-13: bu dang tsha bo rnams bsrungs te //
T02TD2586E:151b-14: rang dga' yid bder gyur nas ni //
T02TD2586E:151b-15: rab gnas bzang po dag tu bzhed //
T02TD2586E:151b-16: de nas dkyil 'khor dag gi lha //
T02TD2586E:151b-17: gshegs gsol gzhung bzhin bya ba'o //
T02TD2586E:151b-18: bdag gis cho ga 'di byas pas //
T02TD2586E:151b-19: 'gro ba kun gyi rgyud tshim shog / rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga panda ti smra tis bsgrigs nas sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so//
